author: Susan Griffin
text:
The Peninsula Strategic Issues Team made up of City of Charleston, SC personnel and chaired by the Police Chief is seeking information from your city or town on whether the presence of street performers is permitted or prohibited. If permitted, the committee would appreciate receiving additional details on business license requirements and how these performers’ behavior is regulated with regard to solicitation as well as hours and permitted areas of operation.  
Conversely should street performance and solicitation be prohibited, we would appreciate learning how this was accomplished.
Please reply to griffins@charleston-sc.gov
Thank you very much.
title: Street Performers
